name: My shared widgets
author: bastho, EELV

sections.description:
create a post-type widgets on a multisite plateform.

Any “my widget” created appears as a widget in all sites and display the HTML source of the created widget.
sections.installation:
1. Upload eelv_widgets to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress network admin
sections.faq:
Does the widgets have an expiration date ?

Yes, It can be edited in the network admin. The default value is “no-expire”
sections.changelog:

  • Fix PHP warnings
  • Remove old <? shortcuts
  • Update textdomain to match plugin slug

release date: aug. 14 2015

  • WP 4.3 compliant

short_description: create and share your text widgets in a multisites plateform
description:
create a post-type widgets on a multisite plateform.

Any “my widget” created appears as a widget in all sites and display the HTML source of the created widget.

upgrade_notice.1.6.2: the_title & the_content filters are applied, so widget's content can be different
